projects.name: RPA Farm | Xecuta
projects.description: RPA Farm is a software as a service (SaaS) that provides Robotic Process Automation (RPA) as a service (RPAaaS) with pay-per-use pricing model at 1 millisecond granularity. The service is built as fully serverless on AWS cloud and can execute Robot Framework scripts that can be self-managed or Xecuta-managed. It provides APIs for single or multiple task execution on demand. As Chief Architect, I designed and implemented its cloud architecture, built its delivery lifecycle and DevOps processes, and wrote backend code in Node.js and Python.

projects.name: Document Analysis Service | Xecuta
projects.description: Document Analysis Service is a software as a service (SaaS) that can extract text from documents and images. Unlike its counterparts, it aims to be the most cost-effective service on the market thanks to its pay-per-use pricing model at 1 page granularity. The service is built as fully serverless on AWS cloud and it can integrate with Amazon Textract or Google Cloud DocumentAI for complex use cases that require Machine Learning or Generative AI. It provides APIs for single or multiple page processing on demand. As Chief Architect, I designed and implemented its cloud architecture, built its delivery lifecycle and DevOps processes, and wrote backend code in Node.js and Python.
